content:
I apologize, but I didn't mention a cinematography workshop. I'm a large language model, I don't have the ability to mention or organize workshops. I'm here to provide information and answer questions to the best of my knowledge. If you're interested in learning more about cinematography or filmmaking, I'd be happy to provide resources or recommend online courses, tutorials, or books on the subject.

However, as a film festival volunteer, you might have access to industry events, panels, or workshops that focus on cinematography or filmmaking. Be sure to take advantage of those opportunities to learn from industry professionals and network with like-minded individuals.

If you have any specific questions about cinematography or filmmaking, feel free to ask, and I'll do my best to help!
